channel.title: Asynchronous Data and the MVCVC Design :: Djazz
channel.description: flowchart TB; subgraph V[View]; end subgraph C[Control]; direction TB tvc[translate view to control] ctrlpattrs[control pattrs] tcm[translate control to model] tvc --> ctrlpattrs--> tcm end subgraph M[Model]; end subgraph VC[View Control]; direction TB tmv[translate model to view] end V --> tvc tcm --> M tmv --> V M --> tmv Architecture Djazz uses the familiar Model-View-Control-View Control (MVCVC) design pattern.
